name: Tropical Abundance
about: What it is:A three-step haircare system repairs split ends, reduces breakage, and prevents future damageu2014in the iconic scent of Cheirosa 62..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Damage, Split Ends, and Breakage.Highlighted Ingredients:- Buriti Fruit Oil: Brimming with healthy fats to fight frizz and strengthen dry, brittle hair..What Else You Need to Know:This three-piece, limited-edition set includes damage-repairing Brazilian Joia shampoo and conditioner with Sol Bond Technology, and a 72-hour frizz fighting leave-in conditioner with nourishing Brazil nut oil..Fragrance Description:Smells like the iconic scent of Cheirosa 62...This Set Contains:- 3 oz/ 90 mL Brazilian Joia Strengthening + Smoothing Shampoo
ingredients: -Buriti Fruit Oil: Brimming with healthy fats to fight frizz and strengthen dry, brittle hair..-Brazilian Nut Oil: Rich in selenium to nourish and protect and restore vital shine..-SOL Seal Technology: Proven to repair damaged hair and prevent future hair damage in one use...Brazilian Joia Strengthening + Smoothing Shampoo:.Water (Aqua), Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Brazilian Joia Strengthening + Smoothing Shampoo:.-Wet hair thoroughly. Pour au202fquarter-sizeu202famount of shampoou202finto the palms of your hands and rub together to create light lather.u202fu202f.-Gently massage the product directly into youru202fscalp for one to two minutes focusing on theu202froots.u202f.-While shampooing, finger comb hair in a downwards direction to effectively clean and remove anyu202fstyling products youu2019ve used.u202f.-Rinse out and apply conditioner for maximum damage repairing and hydrating benefits as directed.u202fu202f..Brazilian Joia Strengthening + Smoothing Conditioner:.-After cleansing, evenly apply enough conditioner to coat hair from mid-length to ends..-Leave on for two to three minutes before rinsing thoroughly...Brazilian Joia Milky Leave-In Conditioner:.-Sprayu202fon damp hair from mid-length to ends before heat styling or air drying. If using with other styling products, use first. .-Perfect for restyling or second-day hairu2014can apply to slightly dampened or dry hair to instantly rehydrate strands. .-p.s. thereu2019s no need to rinse, just leave it (and love it).
